name: FamilyScrum
0:
”Alexa, Open Family Scrum”
”Add new member”
”Add new Task”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: family scrum
des:
With Family Scrum, you can create and assign some simple fun tasks, to your family members, and track their progress. This will enable you to spend some quality fun time together, as a family every day. Members can be added with any avataar name like Daddy Pig, Mommy Pig, Peppa and George or any super hero characters as per your wish. Task status can be updated as open, in-progress or completed. You can run this scrum weekly, in a simple and fun filled agile way, and celebrate your achievements at the end of the week. you can ask for 'help' at any time for assistance.

Prerequisite: Enable reminder permissions for this skill in your Alexa app in mobile.

Usage:

User: Open Family Scrum
Alexa: <Welcome message>
User: Add new member 'Peppa'
Alexa: Added new member 'Peppa'
User: Add new task to peppa
Alexa: What task would you like to assign?
User: Jumping up and down in muddy puddle
Alexa:Task number one added successfully and assigned to peppa. Task description is Jumping up and down in muddy puddle
User: Update task number two as completed for peppa
Alexa: Task number two for peppa has been updated as completed
User: what peppa is doing this week?
Alexa: Got status for peppa. Task Number 1 Jumping up and down in muddy puddle is open. Task Number 2 sing a song is completed.
User: Give me quick status for this week
Alexa: Quick Status for this week. Peppa got 4 open tasks. 1 completed task. George got 1 open task.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
